author: IGN.com (podcasts@ign.com)
title: Keepin' It Reel : Keepin' It Reel, Episode 302: The Future of Hollywood's Biggest Franchises
text:
Keepin' It Reel, Episode 302: The Future of Hollywood's Biggest Franchises 
Welcome back to Keepin' It Reel! In this week's episode of IGN's movies podcast, Jim Vejvoda and Terri Schwartz bring you some of the latest in genre movie news. 
This week's topics include Ant-Man and the Wasp, Captain Marvel, Black Panther, what's next for the Terminator franchise, Daniel Craig's candid thoughts on his future as James Bond, The Fast and the Furious 8, Transformers 5, Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, Star Wars -- Episode VIII, The Martian, Ghostbusters and more. 
We also discuss this week's new releases Pan and Steve Jobs.
